sentences.sContent: By innocently lying to detectives, she’d put herselfinaninvidious position.
sentences.sCn: 由于无意间向侦探撒了谎，她把自己置于一个尴尬的境地。

synos.tran: 诽谤的；不公平的；引起反感的；易招嫉妒的

trans.tranCn: 诽谤的；不公平的；引起反感的；易招嫉妒的
trans.tranOther: unpleasant, especially because it is likely to offend people or make you unpopular
